verses.verse: So I encourage, first of all, for pleas, prayers, interventions, thanks to be made on behalf of all people,
on behalf of kings and all the people who are in a higher position so that we may lead through a quiet and calm life in every bit of godliness and respect.
You see, this is nice and acceptable in the sight of our Rescuer, God,
who wants all people to be rescued and to come into a correct understanding of truth.
You see, there is one God, also one middleman between God and people, a person, the Anointed King Jesus,
the One who gave Himself to be a release payment on everyone's behalf, the witness at its own right times,
into which I was put as a public speaker and missionary (I am telling the truth in the Anointed King; I am not lying), a teacher of non-Jews in trust and truth.
So I intend for the men to be praying in every place raising up holy hands without rage and questioning,
similarly also, for the women to be decorating themselves in an orderly demeanor with modesty and proper focus, not in hair weaves, gold, pearls, or very expensive clothing,
but what is appropriate for women promising God-worship through good actions.
A woman must learn in calmness in total compliance.
I don't give a woman permission to be teaching, nor to be domineering over a man, but to be in calmness.
You see, Adam was sculpted first, after that Eve.
And Adam was not fooled, but the woman, after being fooled, has become in violation.
But she will be rescued through the raising of children if they stay in trust, love, and sacredness with proper focus.
